groupAdvantage.CannotUse: Cannot use „{action}” Action. It costs {cost} Advantage and you only have {advantage}.

Batter.AttackerWon: Attacker won the Batter and applied Prone to their enemy!

Trick.DefenderWon: Defender won the Trick and gains 1 Advantage!
Trick.AttackerWon: Attacker won the Trick and gains 1 Advantage! Additionally, if GM allows, they can apply a single Condition of choice to the enemy: @Condition[ablaze]{Ablaze}, @Condition[blinded]{Blinded} or @Condition[entangled]{Entangled}.

AdditionalEffort.DialogText: Select how much Advantage you want to use. You can use any integer value between {min} and {max}.
AdditionalEffort.CantSpendLess: Cannot spend less Advantage on Additional Effort than minimum!

shiftRollMode.name: Shift Roll Mode
shiftRollMode.hint: Select which Roll Mode will be used when using Actions while holding Shift key.

bypassDefault.name: Default Bypass Mode
bypassDefault.hint: If checked, all Rolls will be Bypassed by default. If unchecked, all Rolls will show a Dialog by default. Pressing Alt key reverses the behaviour (for example, holding Alt while this setting is unchecked will bypass the Roll).

advantageDesc.name: Show Advantage Descriptions
advantageDesc.hint: If checked, Group Advantage actions triggered via TAH will post their full descriptions to Chat. Using Group Advantage requires installed and enabled Up in Arms module.

displayUnequipped.name: Display Unequipped
displayUnequipped.hint: Whether to display unequipped weapons on the Combat tab or not.

groupLores.name: Group Magic Lores
groupLores.hint: Whether to display magic Lores grouped into a tabs. If disabled, spells from Lores will display as lists.

groupTrappings.name: Group Trappings
groupTrappings.hint: Whether to display Trappings grouped into tabs by category. If disabled, Trapping types will display as lists.

maxCharacters.name: Max Characters
maxCharacters.hint: Maximum number of characters displayed in Action names. Set 0 to disable trimming.
